Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining adventure featuring real-time player interaction, procedural world generation, and mobile-optimized controls. Players explore underground caverns, mine valuable resources, upgrade their equipment, and compete for leaderboard positions while managing fuel, hull integrity, and heat resistance. The game includes an admin system for host management, persistent world saves, and a comprehensive upgrade shop for enhancing mining capabilities.
